contextId.information: Paul uses this question to tell how he feels about the situation he wrote about in [[:en:bible:notes:php:01:15|15-17]]. Possible meanings are 1) this is an idiom that means "It does not matter." or 2) the words "shall I think about this" are understood as part of the question. AT: "What then shall I think about this?" or "This is what I think about it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
